# mediaPlayingStarted()

**Instance Method**

Tells the system that the Notification Content app extension began playing a media file.

## Declaration

```swift
func mediaPlayingStarted()
```

## Discussion

In your Notification Content app extension code, call this method when you programmatically begin playing a media file. When called, the system updates the appearance of the media playback button displayed in the notification content extension’s interface. For more information about implementing a notification content extension, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UserNotificationsUI/UNNotificationContentExtension].

## Controlling media playback in notification content extensions

- **mediaPlayingPaused()**: Tells the system that the Notification Content app extension stopped playing a media file.
